header.welcome_text: Hello, my name is Nikita Akulich and I am
header.about: creating modern and responsive web aplications.

skils.text: I am inspired by creating great work with people who are as passionate as I am about building something awesome.
skils.text1: HTML, CSS, SASS, React, Bootstrap, Gatsby.js,
skils.text2: Photoshop, Illustrator, XMind, Prototyping, Wireframing, User Research, Usability Testing.
skils.text4: Javascript, Node.js, MongoDB, GraphQL, Visual Studio Code.

personal.text: At the moment I study at BSUIR and work on freelance for about a year. I have been engaged in web development for a long time, constantly striving to develop and learn something new. I am not afraid of difficulties and ready to solve problems of any complexity.

items.text1: Developing web interfaces for sites or web applications.
items.text2: Developing web sites and web applications(UI/UX Design).
items.text: I am a Junior Frontend Developer with enough experience.
items.text3: Developing and creating different types of web sites and web applications.
items.text4: Developing and creating web servers for web sites and web applications.

form.text-muted: I'll never share your email with anyone else.
